features: Water Doodle Mat - Reusable - Toddler toys age 2-4 5 6. Simply fill the magic pen with clean water and start drawing. After 3-10 minutes, it magically disappears, and kids can doodle on it over and over again. 2 3 4 5 + year old girl gifts toys

Water Magic Doodle Mat Boys Girls Toys - Large Area for Doodle - Size: 31 x 31 inch with letters printed on side, leaving more room for your kids' doodle art. Great mess free learning art toys crafts for 2 3 4 5 6 year old girl boy

Aqua Mat - Just add water and start the magic. Safe & no mess & easy to clean storage --- No paint, Non-toxic, Non-polluting. No mess with water proof backing. Easy Storage, can be folded into a compact size. Perfect art activities gifts for 2 3 4 5 6 year old girls boys

Water Drawing Mat Doodle with booklet full of simple Drawings Step-by-Step - Stimulate kids perception imagination creativity brain development etc. Doodle on Floor Table or on Floor. Package includes: Water doodle mat x 1 + Pens x 3 + Drawing template x 4 + Drawing booklet x 1

Perfect gift for girls & boys 2 3 + year old - The doodle mat with alphabet and cartoons. Kids can practice letters with tons of fun. A great learning toy for toddlers. Perfect for for kids birthday gift or Christmas gift

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fun and NO mess!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter enjoys this mat alot. She can write on it and then in 5mins it goes away. Very clean too. Make sure it is dry completely before putting away. Great mat !!! Love it 😀

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fun and learning mat!
reviews.reviewText: This was a present for our nephews and they loved it! they just got it so no revies on durability yet, but looks solid and good. Recommend for entertaining the little oned!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift for my 2.5 year old. He loves it. He LOVED the dinosaurs on the side, the "markers", paint brush pen, and stamps were easy to use. Took a star off because the roller stamp came damaged, but other than that, everything was perfect. My son loves to color and this is a great mess free LARGE area for him to color on. Definitely would recommend if you have a little artist.Just a note: my son colors really hard so some of the coating rubbed off and left marks so if you want to avoid that from happening just remind your little one to be gentle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is Fantastic. Easy to use, easily dries. Markers and Matt last forever. Just a cool product. I'd definitely recommend this product for any age child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We have had so much fun using this with the toddler. No mess and they love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pens don't stay closed so my solution is to dip them in water instead of filling them up. The mat was a nice size not a big as it looks on the picture but it's large. It clears up after awhile as long as it doesn't get soaked. My 2yr old thought it would be funny to pour the bowl of water on it and then do his hand prints. It took a good amount of time to dry out and become clear. It also doesn't go back white but a light pink. It doesn't bother me. He's two who cares. Overall I don't regret buying it. It served it's purpose to keep him busy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers that love to draw!
reviews.reviewText: Such an easy mess free activity! Keeps my toddler busy for a while! No more worrying about markers and crayons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024

reviews.reviewText: I previously purchased this for my niece when she was about 2, and have newly purchased it for my 15mo son -- he had shown an interest in colouring but kept putting the crayons in his mouth, so this option seemed suitable to get him the skills while we learn to not put everything in your mouth. He absolutely loves it! He will point excitedly at the mat (folded up on the shelf) when he wants to use it, squeal when I get the message and take it down, and scribble like a maniac on the mat with the "markers". Yes, he tries to put them in his mouth and I have to take it away sometimes, but in general he just loves to scribble. Note that his attention span isn't great so it'll offer entertainment for about 5 minutes before he's onto the next thing, but we use it frequently so it's def getting its money's use :)About the product itself, it is holding up well, no stains on it (as I read on some other reviews), dries nicely, feels durable, comes with lots of accessories (we put most aside, just have a few "markers" and stamps out), and has cute animal letters around the outside that he loves pointing at and having me tell him what they are.Def recommend :)
Purchased as a gift and it was a hit.

Buena calidad del material, los accesorios muy divertidos para los niños. Olvídate de los rayones en las paredes y la ropa manchada con plumones. Lo único desagradable para los niños es que el dibujo se seca rápido pues pintan con agua. Pero es una buena opción para fomentar la creatividad.
Fast delivery.The grand kids love it kept them busy for hours even added a paint brush.Highly recommended.
Good size n fun for kids
